Package de.ikor.sip.foundation.core.declarative.orchestration.scenario.dsl

Class ConditionalCallScenarioConsumerDefinition.Branch<I>

java.lang.Object
de.ikor.sip.foundation.core.declarative.orchestration.common.dsl.DslDefinitionBase<S,R>
de.ikor.sip.foundation.core.declarative.orchestration.scenario.dsl.ScenarioDslDefinitionBase<ConditionalCallScenarioConsumerDefinition<R,M>.Branch<I>,I,M>
de.ikor.sip.foundation.core.declarative.orchestration.scenario.dsl.ConditionalCallScenarioConsumerDefinition.Branch<I>
All Implemented Interfaces:
ScenarioConsumerCalls<ConditionalCallScenarioConsumerDefinition<R,M>.Branch<I>,I,M>
Enclosing class:
ConditionalCallScenarioConsumerDefinition<R,M>
public final class ConditionalCallScenarioConsumerDefinition.Branch<I> extends ScenarioDslDefinitionBase<ConditionalCallScenarioConsumerDefinition<R,M>.Branch<I>,I,M> implements ScenarioConsumerCalls<ConditionalCallScenarioConsumerDefinition<R,M>.Branch<I>,I,M>
Class representing on branch of a conditional statement:
  • Allows to add consumer-calls to this conditional branch using the statements defined in ScenarioConsumerCalls
  • Can spawn alternative branches for the condition via elseIfCase(Predicate) and elseCase()

    • elseIfCase

      public ConditionalCallScenarioConsumerDefinition<R,M>.Branch<ConditionalCallScenarioConsumerDefinition<R,M>> elseIfCase(Predicate<ScenarioOrchestrationContext<M>> predicate)
      Defines an alternative conditional branch that is executed if the given predicate matches.
      Parameters:
      predicate - Predicate to test for execution of the branch
      Returns:
      The conditional branch

    • elseCase

      public ConditionalCallScenarioConsumerDefinition<R,M>.Branch<R> elseCase()
      Defines a non-conditional branch that is executed if none of the previous conditional ones matched.

      Needs to be the last statement of the condition - all conditional branches should be attached previously to using this method via elseIfCase(Predicate).

      Returns:
      The unconditional branch

    • endCases

      public R endCases()
      Ends the condition and returns to the previous scope.
      Returns:
      Previous scope of the orchestration definition
